text: Christopher Eugene "Chris" O'Donnell (born June 26, 1970) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He is known for his roles in NCIS: Los Angeles, Batman & Robin, Batman Forever, Scent of a Woman, and in Vertical Limit. O'Donnell was born on June 26, 1970 in Winnetka, Illinois. He has been married to Caroline Fentress since 1997. They have five children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:People from Winnetka, Illinois
title: Chris O'Donnell
